law.history: Amended 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 88, sec. 1, effective April 10, 2014. -- Amended 2011 Ky. Acts ch. 82, sec.5, effective June 8, 2011. -- Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 73, sec. 4, effective June 26, 2007. -- Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 138, sec. 1, effective July 12, 2006. -- Created 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 365, sec. 1, effective April 24, 2002.
